schema.name: Yellow Zucchini Pesto Past

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: cook the penne pasta according to package instructions; chop the broccoli, cauliflower, and yellow zucchini into bite-sized pieces.
Steam the broccoli and cauliflower for about 5 minutes, or until tender yet crisp.
In a skillet over medium heat, saut√© the chopped yellow zucchini for about 7 minutes, or until it begins to soften.

Reduce the heat to low, add the cooked pasta, steamed broccoli, cauliflower, and pesto to the skillet with the zucchini. Cook for an additional 3 minutes, stirring until everything is well combined and heated through.
Stir in the cream cheese until the pasta is evenly coated and creamy.

schema.description: This Yellow Zucchini Pesto Pasta is a delight for those looking for a healthy, low-sugar yet high-fiber meal. Perfectly fitting within the realm of healthy recipes, this dish combines the goodness of vegetables with the rich, creamy texture of pesto and cream cheese to create a healthified version of your favorite pasta. Suitable for anyone aiming to maintain a balanced diet without compromising on taste.
